abstract: Future is looking bright for upstart ukulele band the Prettiots, who have gained attention of record labels after funding their own trip to South by Southwest festival.
lead_paragraph: Kay Kasparhauser and her young band spent $10,000 to go to Austin, Tex., for South by Southwest and sometimes played to almost empty rooms. But record-label people heard them, and now things are happening.

headline.main: SXSW Pays Off for the Prettiots
headline.print_headline: Paying Their Own Way to SXSW Worked Out

snippet: Kay Kasparhauser and her young band spent $10,000 to go to Austin, Tex., for South by Southwest and sometimes played to almost empty rooms. But record-label people heard them, and now things are happening.
